description:
Note : Adobe Premiere Pro is included in the materials. You can Download it from Lecture 3.

This is the latest course updated in March 2016.

Hi , thanks for checking out my course.

In this course,I will teach you to use this powerful editing software from the ground up. You'll learn to use the new customizable interface and all the new features of this updated version of Premiere Pro.

Learn how to work within the Premiere Pro interface, capturing, editing and exporting your videos confidently and professionally. Youâ€™ll also learn how to add video transitions and video effects, how to edit your audio and export your project for the best outcome.

Adobe premiere Pro CS6 is the fastest and most efficient nonlinear video editor and also the first to offer an intuitive, dedicated Lumetri Color panel for manipulating color and light, plus a Morph Cut transition that lets you quickly create the most seamless talking-head scenes imaginable. The app also delivers dozens of features designed to help you make the switch from Final Cut or Avid, including common commands, panels and keyboard shortcuts. This course is there to teach you all these features step by step.

Let's get started!!
title: (New) The Ultimate Adobe Premiere Pro CS6 Tutorial
